Tenten summons multiple weapons connected with [[wire strings]] to her fingertips from one of her [[scrolls]], directing them towards her opponent in a stream formation. After the final weapon hits the opponent, Tenten uses the strings to make the weapons fly above her opponent. Moving her fingers to make the weapons spin, she then directs the weapons downwards to hit the opponent down into the ground again.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]'', she used a variation of this technique called {{translation|Manipulated Tools: Super Ten Thousand Wild Heavenly Blades|操具・超天刃乱万|Sōgu: Chō Tenjin Ranman}}.
